name: Lost and Farm
description:
Controls: 

WASD or Arrow Key to move (Diagonally too)

1 or 2 to switch between weapons

Space to attack with the selected weapon

In this 2D top-down action game, you play as a simple farm girl who lost her companion. 

Programmer: I'm Joseph Liu, I did the programming for the game. I created enemy ai pathfinding, player weapons and dialogue, intractable objects, and more.

Artist: My name is Tri Bui-- the Pixel Artist for this game. Every art asset and animation in this game was made by me, and we started on the day Game Jam began and after the theme was announced (no cheating!). All of my pixel art is off the top of my head-- without using references.

Level Designer: I am Sean Uslanian-- the Level Designer for this game. I sketched out the game world's layout and each individual area, placed the layout, placed enemies, placed health stations, and tested for polish.
